title: Chorizo, Mushroom and Caramelised Onion Quiche
directions: Chorizo, Mushroom and Caramelised Onion Quiche
ingredients: SHORT CRUST PASTRY (or buy Paneton Prepared Pastry):2 cups plain flourPinch sea salt150g Lewis Road unsalted butter1 egg1 Tbs cold full cream milk

FILLING:1 stick of chorizo, sliced thinly2 red onions, sliced1/3 cup brown sugar2 tbs red wine vinegar6 portobello mushrooms, sliced3 eggs1/3 cup Lewis Road cream1/4 cup Lewis Road milk1/3 cup grated Opaki ManchegoNZ sea salt and pepper
